overview: Before joining Ecometrica, Bertrand Revenaz headed up Camcoâ€™s greenhouse gas assessment services in North America. In that capacity he has worked with companies in the financial, energy, agricultural, and publishing sectors on greenhouse gas assessments and management. Bertrand also worked for the World Bank on sustainable development in Eastern Europe, focusing on the development of IT systems to improve environmental decision making. He graduated with a Masters degree in Atmospheric Sciences (with a focus on Climate Change) from McGill University. In addition, Bertrand spent a number of years working for the Corporate Executive Board advising Fortune 500 corporations on key management best practices in dealing with emerging business issues.
